noumena.chamber_create_new.link_noum_mod: You can link two or more Noums that you own at anytime.  You cannot link your Profile to another of your Noums.

When you link Noums, the connections for each Noum will now be connected to all the Noums linked to it.  The same thing happens to followers. It can help you be better organized or easily share content across your Noums with more connections.

Visibility settings of the most open Noum will be applied to the least open Noum. If Noum A were a “public” Noum and Noum B was a “private” Noum then the default setting for Noum B would be re-set to “public”.
If one of the users has permission to do 3 things in Noum A and 6 things in Noum B, then after linking Noum A & B that user will have permission to do 6 things in both linked Noums.
You can always unlink one or more Noums in a linked Noum group at anytime.

noumena.money.pay.subheading: Use Pay to make a payment to someone else in the community, or someone else outside the community (not available in beta stage). You use Pay when you want to move funds from one of your accounts (your bank account, your Wallet, your credit card) to someone else’s account. It might be to pay them for the services they rendered for you. Or it might be that you are paying them a profit or revenue share from one of your Noums. Transactions usually take 2-3 business days to process and may be slower on weekends and holidays.

noumena.money.setupWallet.terms.paragrap: IMPORTANT INFORMATION ABOUT PROCEDURES FOR OPENING A NEW ACCOUNT - To help the government fight the funding of terrorism and money laundering activities, federal law requires all financial institutions to obtain, verify, and record information that identifies each person who opens an account.

We also may ask to see documentation verifying your identity, such as an unexpired driver’s license or passport, in the case of a business, a certified copy of articles of incorporation and/or a government-issued business license, authorized signers, account owners, and your officers, directors, beneficial owners, controlling shareholders and others.

Before opening an account, we generally must obtain your name, address, date of birth, taxpayer identification number or other identifying number (e.g., SSN or employer identification number) and other information that will allow us to identify you and to better understand you and/or your business.

noumena.money.transer.subheading: Use Transfer to move funds between assets or accounts that you own or control. For example, move money from your bank account to your Main Wallet, or from your Main Wallet to one of your Noum Wallets. Or use transfer to move money from your Wallets to your bank account. You can even move money into your Wallets via your credit card via Transfer. Transactions usually take 2-3 business days to process and may be slower on weekends and holidays.
